# Perstack

> Expert Stack for Agent-first Development. A package manager and runtime for AI agents â€” npm/npx for agents.

## Getting Started

- [Getting Started](https://docs.perstack.ai/getting-started): Run your first Expert in 5 minutes

## Understanding Perstack

- [Core Concept](https://docs.perstack.ai/understanding-perstack/concept): What is Perstack and why it exists
- [Experts](https://docs.perstack.ai/understanding-perstack/experts): Modular micro-agents defined in TOML
- [Runtime](https://docs.perstack.ai/understanding-perstack/runtime): Executes Experts with lifecycle management
- [Registry](https://docs.perstack.ai/understanding-perstack/registry): Share and discover Experts
- [Sandbox Integration](https://docs.perstack.ai/understanding-perstack/sandbox-integration): Production-grade isolation

## Making Experts

- [Overview](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts): How to define and develop Experts
- [Skills (MCP)](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts/skills): Connect tools via Model Context Protocol
- [Base Skill](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts/base-skill): Built-in tools for file operations and more
- [Testing](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts/testing): Test Experts before publishing
- [Publishing](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts/publishing): Share Experts to the Registry
- [Best Practices](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts/best-practices): Guidelines for effective Experts
- [Examples](https://docs.perstack.ai/making-experts/examples): Sample Expert definitions

## Using Experts

- [Overview](https://docs.perstack.ai/using-experts): Run and integrate Experts
- [Running Experts](https://docs.perstack.ai/using-experts/running-experts): CLI and programmatic execution
- [Workspace](https://docs.perstack.ai/using-experts/workspace): File system context for Experts
- [State Management](https://docs.perstack.ai/using-experts/state-management): Checkpoints and history
- [Error Handling](https://docs.perstack.ai/using-experts/error-handling): Handle failures gracefully

## Operating Experts

- [Deployment](https://docs.perstack.ai/operating-experts/deployment): Run Experts in production
- [Isolation by Design](https://docs.perstack.ai/operating-experts/isolation-by-design): Security architecture
- [Observing](https://docs.perstack.ai/operating-experts/observing): Monitor Expert execution

## References

- [CLI](https://docs.perstack.ai/references/cli): Command-line interface reference
- [perstack.toml](https://docs.perstack.ai/references/perstack-toml): Configuration file specification
- [Providers and Models](https://docs.perstack.ai/references/providers-and-models): Supported LLM providers
- [Registry API](https://docs.perstack.ai/references/registry-api): REST API for the Registry

## Links

- GitHub: https://github.com/perstack-ai/perstack
- Registry: https://platform.perstack.ai/
- X: https://x.com/perstack_ai
